name: Quolerus
overview: Quolerus is a type-in game that is heavily inspired by the Atari 2600 classic, Yars' Revenge. The developer, James Knesek, even asked for and got permission from Atari to develop this game. The game was published in COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1988/11 (Issue #65). The game is very similar to the game it's based on, except in Yars' Revenge, the enemy is on the right side of the screen, whereas in Quolerus, the enemy is on the left.
